title: I bought skin for 487 but riot minused full price - 975
body: _**Hello i need HELP! So today i bought RP for 10Euros its about 1520... I saw one of my favorite skins - Esc. Gragas. And its with 50% discount i was like WOW i will buy it, it's so cheep. And then when i bought it riot minused not 487RP but Full price - 975.... PLEASE HELP ME RIOT I DONT WANT TO LOSE SO MUCH RP! I WANTED TO BUY 5 HEXTECH CHESTS NOW I HAVE ONLY 620RP its not enough! P.S Even in Purchase History it's wroted 487RP but you minused 975. Ofcourse you can check that im not liyng.... HELP!**_{{summoner:2}}

replies.body: I took a look into your  specific issue and verified that Gragas Esq was purchased for 487 RP.  A few hours later you also obtained 5 chests and keys as a bundle.  I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary.  Everything looks okay!

Heya 
Most likely it is only a display-error. Try relogging and or waiting a bit. If that doesn´t help submit a ticket to the Riot support so they can look into the case.

Regards Rkoturdo
